fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- In the day, challenge someone to a Duel that occurs in the following night.
- Attack (Only usable in a Duel)
- Increase your Defense by 1 during your opponent's next turn only. (Only usable in a Duel)
- Use an Overkill attack. (1 use per game, only usable in a Duel)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While a Duel is active, you can only target your opponent, and your opponent can only target you.
- When a Duel starts, a private chat will be made for you and your opponent.
- During the Duel, other people cannot roleblock or control you or your opponent. Roleblock and control abilities are still usable within the Duel.
- During a Duel, you and your opponent each take turns using abilities on each other. Any participant cannot use the same ability two turns in a row.
- The first turn in a Duel is always yours.
- The first to die in a Duel loses. The winner can choose to increase either their Attack or Defense by 1 tier, permanently.
- If both players survive 5 turns, the Duel ends in a tie, and nothing happens.
- After a Duel, you and your opponent cannot use any more actions that night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill at least 3 people using Duels and survive undefeated until the end of the game. Losing one Duel means losing the whole game, even if you survive.
